name: Coin Apocalypse
description:
Description:

Play this simple but super fun game called "Coin Apocalypse"!

Collect coins while avoiding the meteors!

Use the coins to upgrade your stats or buy hats and backgrounds!

Featuring the awesome music of Matthew Pablo!

Controls:

Left Arrow Key/A - Move Left

Right Arrow Key/D - Move Right

Up Arrow Key/W - Jump

Down Arrow Key/S - Pull Down

Spacebar - Skill

P - Toggle Pause

C - Toggle Sound

Credits

Created, Developed, Programmed, and Art by:

Vandenn Games

www.facebook.com/VandennGames

Music by:

Matthew Pablo

www.matthewpablo.com

Made with Flixel
